sents.display: The following are considered effective means of <mark data-entity="observation">contraception</mark>: <mark data-entity="procedure">surgical sterilization</mark>or use of oral contraceptives , barrier <mark data-entity="observation">contraception</mark>with either a condom or diaphragm in conjunction with spermicidal gel , an IUD , or <mark data-entity="condition">contraceptive hormone implant</mark>or patch
